short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview your webpage with Google Fonts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for web developers/designers to quickly preview different Google fonts applied to a web page. A popup menu presents a single select field with font options.
